p: RS was lower in CP and higher in fibrous contents compared to SG, especially the CP and carbohydrate contents (higher in NFC and lower NDF, ADF contents). This is due to it being a leafier grass and having a higher leaf to stem ratio that reflected on higher nutritive values. Other using dwarfs Napier grass with leafier grass, also showed high nutritive values [ 10, 21â€“ 24].
